bug.short_desc: ikiwiki-3.20160509-1.fc25 FTBFS: Failed test at t/git.t line 109
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
ikiwiki-3.20160509-1.fc25 fails to build in F25 because a test fails:
t/find_src_files.t ............. ok To /tmp/ikiwiki-test-git.9837/repo * [new branch] master -> master To /tmp/ikiwiki-test-git.9837/repo 02f5c4d..058da7d master -> master To /tmp/ikiwiki-test-git.9837/repo a8ca4b8..49f11a1 master -> master To /tmp/ikiwiki-test-git.9837/repo 49f11a1..4026adb master -> master # Failed test at t/git.t line 109. # got: 'test4' # expected: 'newdir/test5' To /tmp/ikiwiki-test-git.9837/repo 4026adb..a3d4765 master -> master To /tmp/ikiwiki-test-git.9837/repo a3d4765..d5d0813 master -> master Cloning into '/tmp/ikiwiki-test-git.9837/src'... done. To /tmp/ikiwiki-test-git.9837/repo d5d0813..d35aa9d master -> master # Looks like you failed 1 test of 26. t/git.t ........................ Dubious, test returned 1 (wstat 256, 0x100) Failed 1/26 subtests
A difference between working and failing build root is:
perl-open 1.10-364.fc25 > 1.10-365.fc25 perl-Test-Simple 1.302022-1.fc25 > 1.302026-1.fc25 perl-Memoize 1.03-364.fc25 > 1.03-365.fc25 git-core 2.8.4-1.fc25 > 2.9.0-1.fc25 coreutils 8.25-5.fc25 > 8.25-6.fc25 perl 4:5.24.0-364.fc25 > 4:5.24.0-365.fc25 perl-IO 1.36-364.fc25 > 1.36-365.fc25 perl-libs 4:5.24.0-364.fc25 > 4:5.24.0-365.fc25 perl-Errno 1.25-364.fc25 > 1.25-365.fc25 coreutils-common 8.25-5.fc25 > 8.25-6.fc25 perl-devel 4:5.24.0-364.fc25 > 4:5.24.0-365.fc25 pcre 8.39-0.1.RC1.fc25 > 8.39-1.fc25 perl-SelfLoader 1.23-364.fc25 > 1.23-365.fc25 mesa-libGL 12.0.0-0.1.rc1.fc25 > 12.0.0-0.2.rc2.fc25 perl-Math-Complex 1.59-364.fc25 > 1.59-365.fc25 mesa-libEGL 12.0.0-0.1.rc1.fc25 > 12.0.0-0.2.rc2.fc25 kernel-headers 4.7.0-0.rc2.git3.2.... > 4.7.0-0.rc3.git0.1.... mesa-libglapi 12.0.0-0.1.rc1.fc25 > 12.0.0-0.2.rc2.fc25 shadow-utils 2:4.2.1-10.fc25 > 2:4.2.1-11.fc25 perl-macros 4:5.24.0-364.fc25 > 4:5.24.0-365.fc25 mesa-libgbm 12.0.0-0.1.rc1.fc25 > 12.0.0-0.2.rc2.fc25
This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 25 development cycle. Changing version to '25'.

The bug should be fixed in new version 3.20160905.
https://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=835612#17
... [ Simon McVittie ] * Use git log --no-renames to generate recentchanges, fixing the git test-case with git 2.9 (Closes: #835612) ...

ikiwiki-3.20160509-3.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates.
